EmailTemplate.name: ITM.Email 4.Email 4
EmailTemplate.subject: How One Financial Institution Stopped Handling Cash & Created Better Service
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Tampa Bay Federal Credit Union Offers Face-to-Face Interaction – with Self-Service ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Is it possible to completely eliminate cash handling at a branch? For Tampa Bay FCU, the answer is: you bet! With ITMs, they’ve migrated routine transactions to self-service—helping extend opening times, drive branch efficiencies and reduce operating costs…while deepening customer relationships. See their results and how their customers responded. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
